title: Plat adc LFT!!!!
body:
Plat 3 adc main looking to join a team thats semi serious and looking to improve play.
Free to play and practice every week night, pretty good champ pool able to play all meta picks well, willing to play in tournaments and what not if teams want to.

If interested add me in game :)
http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/308473
